oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Eddy Arnold Show - #086
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The Eddy Arnold Show #86, produced and transcribed in Nashville, TN. by Brown Radio Productions. Featuring Eddy Arnold and the Tennessee Plowboys, the Willis Brothers (introduced as the Oklahoma Wranglers), Roy Wiggins, Skeeter Willis and host 'Pappy' Hal Horton. Opening theme music, 'Cattle Call'; closing theme music, 'Boil Them Cabbage Down'.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold; Willis Brothers; Tennessee Plowboys; Skeeter Willis; Oklahoma Wranglers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Hal Horton) -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Eddy Arnold) -- Easy Rockin' Chair (Eddy Arnold) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Time Changes Everything (Eddy Arnold) -- Hal Horton talks -- Hal Horton introduces the Oklahoma Wranglers -- Blue River (Oklahoma Wranglers) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Eddy Arnold talks -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] (Skeeter Willis) -- Hal Horton talks -- Eddy Arnold talks -- The Letter Marked Unclaimed (Eddy Arnold) -- Closing statement (Hal Horton and Eddy Arnold) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Eddy Arnold Show (Radio program); Horton, Hal, -1948; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Tennessee Plowboys; Willis Brothers; Wiggins, Roy; Oklahoma Wranglers (Musical group); Willis, Skeeter, -1976;
